Germany OpenVZ Linux 100Mbps VPS
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Germany Linux VPS is Open Source Virtualization Technology which provides highest features to the VPS users, with OpenVZ offers compartmentalized file systems, full root access, and reliable performance to virtual private server administrators.LeasedLayer provides Germany Linux VPS Services on high-end Quad Core Xeon servers (all packages are equal-share CPU) for very low prices.

Our platform utilizes SolusVM running OpenVZ and all clients are covered under our 99.9% uptime guarantee. Orders are instantly setup, so within few minutes after ordering you'll be receiving the VPS information on your registered email address. We provide Germany Linux VPS Services at Frankfurt.
